Dr. Toast Live @ Ecstatic Dance

posted April 27, 2010 | music, shows

Wednesday, April 28, 2010, 8-11pm - Historic Sweet's Ballroom @ 1933 Broadway, Oakland, CA [map, info]. Here are the simple guidelines for Ecstatic Dance:

1. No talking on the dance floor
2. Scent-free environment
3. No photos or videos
4. Respect the space
5. Dance however you wish



Dr. Toast Live @ Puttin' On the Ritz

posted March 30, 2010 | music, shows

Some good friends of Dr. Toast are teaming up to do the AIDS/LifeCycle ride - a 545 mile bike ride from SF to LA to raise money for the SF AIDS foundation. Come join us at a fabulous fundraiser at the Bently Reserve! The party starts at 8pm with a special happy hour featuring Toph One, Dr. Toast, and free hors d'oeuvres! Art installation by the fabulous Peter Hudson featuring "Sisyphish" the stroboscopic marvel! Silent auction including exclusive designs and a Bus Party w/ Das Frachtgut (Teacher with the Bus). DJs from The Space Cowboys, Brass Tax, False Profit, Swag, The Deep End, Strategik, Evil Breaks, SEISMIC, Angles of bAss. [tickets] [info] [map]

Thursday, Feb 11, 2009, 5-9pm - Dr. Toast will be joining unk'l funk'l for the Living Room Sessions happy hour at Mars Bar in San Francisco. Come get comfy, have a delicious beverage, and enjoy! [map]



Toast Messenger

posted January 14, 2010 | toasters

The Toast Messenger by Sasha Tseng is only a design concept (sadly), but how awesome would it be to write a message on the surface of the box, then have that message magically toasted onto the bread inside? This could be the next Twitter! (thanks, chip!)


Easy Peasy Spicy Beansy Toast

posted January 3, 2010 | toast-recipes

This recipe was submitted by reader Deano from the UK:

  • Half a can of baked beans
  • two slices of bread
  • teaspoon of chili powder
  • almost a handful of grated cheese
  • butter

Mix the beans, cheese and chili powder together and microwave, simultaneously toast the bread. When all is ready butter the toast and cut in half in triangle shapes. Pour cheesy spicy bean mixture into the center of the plate and put the toast on the outside. Enjoy!

Dr. Toast Live @ Transported

posted December 6, 2009 | music, shows

Thursday, Dec 10, 2009, 8pm-midnight: Ride a biodiesel bus with couches, a dancefloor and a sound system and learn about our universe from the experts. We'll end up in Marin where we will set-up several telescopes and scan the sky for interesting sights. Featuring music by Dr. Toast & Alxndr! Pick Up spot: The Bus Stop Gallery (135 Dore St. Unit C, betwn 9th / 10th in SOMA) [info, map, tickets, facebook]


Dr. Toast Live at Artumnal Gathering

posted November 17, 2009 | music, shows

Friday, November 20, 2009 - "The Black Rock Arts Foundation invites you to the grandest annual celebration of our community's vital spirit and extraordinary artists. Once again, we gather in the majestic Bently Reserve to revel in support of BRAF's mission to inspire art, community and civic participation worldwide. Enter into an enchanted world of abundant art, captivating entertainment, and tempting libations. Participate in interactive art experiences created by community visionaries. Be the art! Join us for our pre-event dinner for delightful fare, cocktails and auction." 9pm - Late, The Bently Reserve, San Francisco [tickets, info, map]


Dr. Toast Live @ Burning Man 2009

posted August 26, 2009 | music, shows

September 2-4, 2009: The Toast will be popping up on the playa in a few different locations this year!

Wednesday, around sunrise: The False Profit Tuesday Party (located at 4:00 and Esplanade). From the press release: "Homo sapiens without the [silicon gene] mutation will be leaving the world of mutant commerce for False Profitâ€™s Tuesday Night party to expose themselves to computerized sounds that will touch their Monkey-Robot brains. It should be no surprise that these sounds will be emitted from the Unimog, preferred vehicle of Space Cowboys who themselves are a future offshoot species of Homo sapiens electronica."

Wednesday, around dusk: The Toast Party at the Relaxomatic Plushitorium. "At the Relaxomatic Plushitorium, you will find a madcap roller coaster ride of tranquility and repose -- If it's soft, squishy, and fun to sit on, you'll probably find it here. Additionally register here to send your grilled Cheese-o-grams to your friends and enemies. Hometown: Brooklyn, NY" (photo: broxtronix)



Friday afternoon, 12:45pm: at El Circo and The Do Lab (located at 10:00 and Biology). "For the first time ever, The Do LaB and El Circo are joining forces to create an unforgettable visual sound camp, Simpler Times, at Burning Man this year. The merging of these iconic communities of San Francisco and Los Angeles is sure to produce one of the most epic and memorable places to be on the playa with the creative explosions, amazing musicians and mind-blowing performances."
